WEATHER FORECAST FOR 29 JANUARY 2025
Issued at 12.00 noon on 28 JANUARY 2025

C
loudy skies can be expected over Southern part of the island.
Showers or thunder showers will occur at times in Northern, North-central, Eastern, Uva and Southern
provinces and in Matale and Nuwara-Eliya districts. Fairly heavy showers above 50 mm can be
expected at some places in the above areas.
Showers or thundershowers will occur at several places elsewhere in the evening or night. Fairly heavy
showers about 75 mm can be expected at some places in Sabaragamuwa province.

L
ight showers may occur in Western province during the morning too.

T
he general public is kindly requested to take adequate precautions to minimize damages caused by temporary
localized strong winds and lightning during thundershowers.
